original_title: The Free Voice of Egypt: Nawal El Saadawi
overview: Portrait of Nawal el-Saadawi (83), who ranks among the most prominent and best-known feminists in the Arab world. Saadawiâ€™s struggle against female genital mutilation, the rules relating to marriage in Islam, and Islamic fundamentalism got her into trouble at several occasions.
title: The Free Voice of Egypt: Nawal El Saadawi
